name: Castle Raider
description:
Grab as much treasure as you can and make it through the castle alive!

Keyboard & Xbox controllers are supported.

Press Alt + Enter to toggle Fullscreen mode.

WASD = Movement, Space = Jump, Enter = Attack, Shift = Block, F = Open .

This is the first game I have ever made. It's short and unpolished but I think it's fun! Most of the art is from the tutorial and is freely available. All music and sound is original, made by myself.


Feeback is very much welcomed!
